thread.title: Steve Gross
thread.title_full: Tax Tiger reviewed by Steve Gross

author: Steve Gross
title: Steve Gross
text:
Clear, calm, energetic, NOT Demeaning,
I am the worst client and drug my feet, Ryan was GREAT and understanding. They never treated me like I was the problem in the system, I was.
I can not say enough about how professional and helpful everyone was and still after the fact still are.
I would send anyone who is in tax trouble to
Tax Tiger . I have my financial life back in my hands because of their hard work. Don't be afraid they are worth every step and dollar.
